title: Introducing: Izzy Getty
content:
With a handful of covers on her Soundcloud, alongside a couple of her own originals, it’s clear that it’s relatively early days for NY’s Izzy Getty.

Whilst the cover showcase her note-perfect and versatile vocal, it’s the originals, in particular, Familiar Lights, that demonstrate her remarkable potential. There’s a real early 00’s pop vibe to it, we’re talking Natalie Imbruglia and Gwen Stefani in terms of the songwriting. Check out a couple of tracks below, including the more bluesy Got The Will.

Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
